Paceinfonet.com – Web hosting from $2.49/mo, Managed SSD Linux VPS at $28/mo and more!

linux web hosting, managed dedicated server, managed vps, paceinfonet.com, windows web hosting April 2, 2020 @ 8:42 am, by Jon Biloh

Paceinfonet.com recently submitted four different offers to be featured on Low End Box, including a Linux based and Windows based web hosting plan, starting at just $2.49/month, a managed VPS  offer and a managed dedicated server for just $69.30/month.

Their WHOIS is public and their ToS/Legal Docs are available for review. They accept PayPal, Credit Card via RazorPay Gateway.

They are a registered company in India, company identification number U72300MH2013PTC242693.

Here’s what they had to say: 

“Paceinfonet.com is a reliable and affordable web hosting solutions provider offering high quality services since 2009. We specializes in offering consistent and cost effective web hosting services in all forms like Shared Hosting, Reseller Hosting, VPS Hosting, Cloud Hosting & Dedicated Server Hosting. We assure the best 24×7, customer service, thereby delivering most value for money.”

More In their own words:
“We provide Fast, Reliable & Secure Web hosting service. Our web hosting servers are located in Tier 4 state-of-the-art Datacenters with multiple premium bandwidth providers which gives a super fast average response time. We provide 20x fast SSD Web Hosting which is much faster than traditional Hard Drives resulting into faster and better performance of your application. Our web hosting plans come with latest softwares and best hosting control panel for windows & linux. Our website hosting plans are best suited for websites and applications targeted towards users from anywhere in the world. We make every effort to ensure that your business and website stays online 24×7 and you get maximum value from money.
Our Linux Web Hosting plans are deployed on Hosting Servers in world-class Data centers. Each Server is equipped with enterprise grade hardware to provide high performance web hosting experience. Having high performance hosting servers, also ensures low latency and faster connectivity between a visitor and Website . Website hosting on our servers is the best choice for your consumers / visitors who are based anywhere in the world. All our plans come with superior resources and offers you hassle free hosting on our servers. Also multiple website hosting can be done within a single hosting server control panel to have ease of use & management. Our web hosting servers also offer the latest cPanel control panel hosting, PHP hosting, WordPress hosting, unlimited Linux web hosting, MySQL Database hosting and that’s not all, the web hosting server also has an Script Installer which offers 100+ free scripts with just one-click. To conclude, our web hosting plans are the best mix of performance, reliability, affordability & technology, so buy your hosting plan now…”
